question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.


In your letter


give contact details for when you are awaygive instructions about how to care for your petdescribe other household duties
text: Hope you are doing well. I was elated to know that you are comfortable staying at my place while I'm on a vacation.

My tour is scheduled from the first to the ninth of July. Although my mobile network might be erratic, you may connect to my tour guide in case of any emergency. I will leave his details on my whiteboard which is placed in the kitchen. As you are familiar with my dog, you will absolutely enjoy his company. You will need to feed him twice and take him for a morning walk.

Apart from that, please don't forget to water my plants. You may need to clean the house every alternate day because my apartment gets dirty as it is closer to a construction site. Lastly, please check for the letters in the mailbox on the weekends as it usually gets delivered on Saturdays.
I will be stress-free during my trip because you are ready to take care of my belongings. Let me know if you need to know anything else.
